problem_text_cn: 如图,小林从P点向西直走12米后,向左转,转动的角度为α,再走12米,如此重复,小林共走了108米回到点P,则α-5的值是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, after Xiaolin walks straight in the direction of west from point P N_0, turns left, the angle of rotation is α, and then walks N_1, repeating this, Xiaolin has walked N_2 and returned to point P, then the value of α-N_3 is ()
raw_comment: 本题主要考查了多边形的外角和等于360°,根据题意判断出所走路线是正多边形是解题的关键．
